column2: Heretic Discovered

Doing my work in [Root.Location.GetName], I discovered that [heretic.GetTitledName] does not seem to follow the doctrines of the Catholic Church as closely as [heretic.GetSheHe] should. One might consider [heretic.GetHerHim] to be a heretic!
I must inform [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] immediately.
I should not bother my liege with the forgivable sins of [heretic.GetTitledFirstName].

Doing his work in [inquisitioner.Location.GetName], [inquisitioner.GetTitledFirstName] discovered that [heretic.GetTitledName] does not seem to follow the doctrines of the Catholic Church as closely as [heretic.GetSheHe] should. One might consider [heretic.GetHerHim] to be a heretic!
[heretic.GetHerHisCap] sins must be exposed. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] will punish [heretic.GetHerHim].
[heretic.GetTitledFirstName] must justify [heretic.GetHerselfHimself].
[heretic.GetTitledFirstName] will be asked to attend a trial.
Justice must be brought to [heretic.GetTitledFirstName]. Bring [heretic.GetHerHim] to me.
Your Inquisitioners will force [heretic.GetTitledFirstName] to come with them and bring [heretic.GetHerHim] to trial. At least, they will try.
They fail.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] forgives [heretic.GetHerHim].
The Inquisitioners send by [client.GetTitledName] to [heretic.location.GetName] have accused me of heresy. Now, [client.GetSheHe] asked me to attend a trial and justify myself.
I am innocent and have nothing to hide. I will attend.
A foolish request.
[heretic.GetTitledName] accepted and is willing to justify himself in a trial.
Very well. It shall take place tomorrow.
[heretic.GetTitledName] informed me that [heretic.GetSheHe] does not believe a trial is necessary. [heretic.GetSheHeCap] said, [heretic.GetHerHis] innocence is obvious.
I think [heretic.GetSheHe] is innocent then.
The Inquisitioners send by [client.GetTitledName] to [heretic.location.GetName] have accused me of heresy. A group of them has attempted to take me captive, but my guards were able to stop them.
These fools.
My Inquisitioners lead by [inquisitioner.GetTitledName] have attempted to capture [heretic.GetTitledFirstName]. Unfortunately, [heretic.GetHerHis] guards were able to stop them.
Is it message from [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]? [heretic.GetSheHeCap] must be innocent.

The Inquisitioners send by [client.GetTitledName] to [heretic.location.GetName] have accused me of heresy. A group of them ambushed me on the roads of [Root.Location.GetName] and knocked me out. Now I am a prisoner in [client.location.GetName], waiting for [client.GetTitledFirstName] to bring me to trial.
I did not expect the [ROOT.Culture.GetName] Inquisition. Nobody did...
My Inquisitioners lead by [inquisitioner.GetTitledName] have successfully captured [heretic.GetTitledFirstName]. [heretic.GetSheHe] is now imprisoned and waiting for the trial.
The trial will begin tomorrow.

Today, the trial of [heretic.GetTitledNameWithNick] will takes place. [inquisitioner.GetTitledFirstName] has collected all evidence [inquisitioner.GetSheHe] was able to gather. Everything is ready. Shall we begin?
Yes.
Better make sure that [heretic.GetFirstName] knows what he is supposed to say...
Is tortured before the trial begins.
If I think about it - [heretic.GetTitledName] is clearly innocent.

Just a few hours before todays trial, [client.GetTitledFirstName] approached my cell. [Client.GetHerHisCap] men approached me and brought me to another room, deep down in the dungeons: The torture room. [client.GetFirstName] made clear that only a confession could safe me from unbelievable pain.
I will confess.
Never!
I did not even need to torture [heretic.GetFirstName]. [heretic.GetSheHECap] agreed to confess immediately.
Good news
Despite intensive torture, [heretic.GetFirstName] stayed strong. [heretic.GetSheHe] spit on my face, saying [heretic.GetSheHe] would never confess.
That fool.
I hereby begin the trial of [heretic.GetTitledNameWithNick], accused of vile heresy. The evidence suggests that [heretic.GetHerHis] sins are numerous and of terrible nature.
The evidence is as I said, eh, very, eh convincing... Do you confess?
Everybody knows that [heretic.GetSheHe] has done unholy things and pacted with the devil.
In particular, I want to point out [heretic.GetHerHis] sinful sexual life.
Everyone knows that [heretic.GetFirstName] is a treacherous murderer.
Do not neglect [heretic.GetHerHis] envy. A terrible trait.
[heretic.GetHerHisCap] greed is just one sign for [heretic.GetHerHis] pact with the devil.
[client.GetTitledName] has read the long list of accusations against me. I am asked to confess my sins.
Yes, it's true. I pacted with the devil and did all kinds of terrible things.
All lies!
[heretic.GetTitledName] confessed [heretic.GetHerHis] pact with the devil and listed all kinds of terrible things [heretic.GetSheHe] did.
Very well. Let us proceed to the judgement.
[heretic.GetTitledName] did not confess. [Heretic.GetSheHeCap] denied everything, calling the whole evicence a hoax.
So we will judge by the evidence.
It is now to me and the other judges to evaluate the evidence and decide if [heretic.GetSheHe] is guilty.
I believe in [heretic.GetHerHis] guilt.
The judges decide: Guilty
The judges decide: Innocent
[heretic.GetSheHe] is clearly innocent.
The judges decide: Guilty
The judges decide: Innocent
The judges found me to be guilty nonetheless. The punishment will be announced soon.
Bad news.
The judges decided that [heretic.GetTitledName] is indeed guilty. We must now decide the punishment.
[heretic.GetSheHeCap] shall stay imprisoned.
[heretic.GetSheHeCap] will burn at the stake!
The judges found me to be innocent. I am free to go.
Good news!
The judges found [heretic.GetTitledFirstName] to be innocent. [heretic.GetSheHeCap] is free to go.
It is God's will.
The judges decided that I shall stay a prisoner of [client.GetTitledName].
At least I am alive.
The judges decided that I shall stay be burned at the stake.
God forgive me!

My men have put together a large pile of wood. They drag [heretic.GetFirstName] to the stake and tie [heretic.GetHerHim]. I announce: 'You, [heretic.GetTitledNameWithNick] have been found guilty of heresy and vile sins. The cleansing flames of this fire will bring you to the judgement of the Lord.'
Start the fire.
